name: Infused Ancient Defender
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Dust Brigade Notum Infuser" "274552" #L "Ancient Defender" "267627" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Note:To build your Ancient Defender, go here: #L "Ancient Defender" "/tell recipe 621" Dust Brigade Notum Infuser + Ancient Defender = #L "Infused Ancient Defender" "274556" Skills: | CL 1500 |
